ComicInfo.Title: Episode Five: The Money Shot
ComicInfo.Writer: Andrew Osborne,Viktor Kalvachev,Kosta Yanev,Viktor Kalvachev,Andrew Osborne,Kosta Yanev
ComicInfo.Summary: Pipe dreams go up in smoke and schemes collide in a purple haze of deception and surveillance, but who’s following who, who’s getting fooled and who just needs help picking out a new ‘do? You’ll flip your wig for issue #5 of Image Comics’ smash hit new crime series as hippies let their freak flags fly, mobsters get mellow and “tough love” takes a deadly turn!
ComicInfo.Characters: Bruce Maddox,Marcellus Tate,Mauro,Gus,Roy Devine Jr.,Tony Luciano,Buddy,Lino,Rachel Maddox,Roy Devine Sr.,Cherry Popz,Billy Ducharme
